Sentencas: The chemical compatibility of thin electrolyte layers and their support materials at high temperatures is crucial for the performance in solid oxide cells and membranes.
Titulo: Interaction between proton conducting BaCe0.2Zr0.7Y0.1O3 electrolyte and structural ceramics during sintering

Sentencas: This work describes the chemical interaction between the electrolyte material, BaCe0.2Zr0.7Y0.1O3 + 0.5 wt% NiO (BCZY), and structural ceramics Al2O3, 8 mol% yttria stabilized zirconia (8YSZ), TiO2, CeO2 and MgO during sintering.
Titulo: Interaction between proton conducting BaCe0.2Zr0.7Y0.1O3 electrolyte and structural ceramics during sintering

Sentencas: 1:1 wt% powder mixtures of the electrolyte material and structural ceramics were annealed at 1500 degrees C for 5 h, with the phase composition being determined through XRD analysis at room temperature.
Titulo: Interaction between proton conducting BaCe0.2Zr0.7Y0.1O3 electrolyte and structural ceramics during sintering

Sentencas: Subsequently, the material interaction between BCZY films deposited on the most promising structural ceramic MgO was investigated by SEM and EDS.
Titulo: Interaction between proton conducting BaCe0.2Zr0.7Y0.1O3 electrolyte and structural ceramics during sintering

Sentencas: In particular, the complex sintering requirements to form single-phase BCZY electrolyte layers is troubled upon coating and sintering BCZY on MgO. Hereby, the diffusion of NiO into the MgO support leads to a deficiency of NiO in the BCZY layer, making the solution and precipitation mechanism required to form the perovskitic phase unable to occur.
Titulo: Interaction between proton conducting BaCe0.2Zr0.7Y0.1O3 electrolyte and structural ceramics during sintering

Sentencas: In extreme scenarios, the electrolyte layer depletion of NiO can even cause the decomposition of a single-phase BCZY into BaZrO3, Ce-Y fluorite and a BCZY perovskite phase of undefined composition.
Titulo: Interaction between proton conducting BaCe0.2Zr0.7Y0.1O3 electrolyte and structural ceramics during sintering
